TopicTitle: Looking for BIG WINGS and other essential spaceplane parts

Articles.Content:
Hey all,

I love the game and all the great mod-work everyone has put into this, but trying to find parts you actually need is... confusing to say the last. Here\'s hoping that the final game will have some kind of in-game mod browser or something

Anyway - please recommend me where I can get some laaaarger wing pieces (I saw some really big ones in white owl\'s YT series but haven\'t been able to find them yet). I will also happily accept recommendations for other 'essential' spaceplane modpacks. Those kinds of parts tend to get lost in-between all the rocketry

Thanks!

-Stigma
C7 and JAWRD are the packs/mods you\'re looking for.
Also TiberDyne Aerospace R&D Division - Shuttle Booster System Version 2.0 and a few others
